titleStmt.title: The assurance of abby and other church-lands in England to the possessors, cleared from the doubts and arguments raised about the danger of resumption in answer to a letter of a person of quality / by Nathaniel Johnston ...
titleStmt.author: Johnston, Nathaniel, 1627-1705.
Coventry, William, Sir, 1628?-1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills, and are to be sold at his printing-house ...,

notesStmt.note: The "person of quality" is Sir William Coventry. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
